attributes.action: Impose trade sanctions on Israel and urge the UN to investigate war crimes in Palestine now
attributes.additional_details:
Prime Minister, Cabinet and Foreign and Commonwealth Office

This nation is not unclear about its views on the actions of Israel in Palestine.

We implore you to take action immediately and in our name.

1.	The UK must stop trade with Israel until Israel ends its blockade and ceases to occupy Palestine.
2.	The UK must urge the UN to investigate and take action on war crimes being committed in the region.
3.	The UK must use its considerable power and influence to urge The White House, Europe and The Commonwealth Nations to do the same.

It is your responsibility, and well within your power to act on these matters with a matter or urgency.

In the view of millions of British citizens, you are personally responsible for the government’s action or indeed lack of action on these matters.

I pledge that I will take account for your responsiveness to the will of the public in the coming elections.
